body: A solid hentai but I think to vice president character was really uneeded, he had one scene with his sister and he didn't add much to the plot anyway. I'm glad the animated version changed that which sucks since it only has one episode but regardless I enjoyed most of this other than the little girl with a dick stuff, that was kind of a turn off for me.
Wait, Yuuji is not join the fuck?
Nice, so this is the manga that spawned Pink Pineapple's animation of the same name.
yuuji was right, they're all sluts.
